message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, Bob, but I think we should both try to be reasonable.
Come on, I'm starting to lose value here. Meet me in the middle... of the remainder!
Let's cut our losses, Bob.  I'm offering you more than before, but I won't go lower.  This is my final offer.
